title: University of Bern - IWI
description:
As part of my PhD research, I am currently investigating fair and participative shift scheduling practices in healthcare facilities (project website).

Previously, I contributed to interdisciplinary projects about the digital publication of legal content (digitallaw.unibe.ch and itandlaw.unibe.ch). For further information about these projects, please visit the blog.

title: University of Bern - VWI
description: I earned a BSc and MSc in Economics with a focus on microeconomics and econometrics. Additionally, I completed minors in Information Systems and Computer Science during my bachelor's studies.

title: Enotrac AG
description: At Enotrac AG, I contributed to knowledge management and process redesign projects. Furthermore, I supported modernization efforts for the IC2000 and Re460 train fleets for the Swiss Federal Railways.
